description:
The Four Kings fight together against Joie, the strongest enemy they`ve ever faced and one who can`t be eaten! Meanwhile, NEO gets ready to leave the chaos of the stadium and indeed the Human World behind them, but they also plan to take Komatsu with them, whether he`s willing or not!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kishikaisei no Ichigeki! Shitennou, Kyuukyoku Waza!!
Resuscitation Strike! The Four Kings` Ultimate Skill!
起死回生の一撃! 四天王, 究極技!!
